House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08079
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RECONSTITUTING THE GOVERNING BOARD OF THE PHILIPPINE COCONUT AUTHORITY (PCA)
ABSTRACT : Aims to reconstitute the PCA Board that shall manage the Coconut Farmers and Industry Development Trust Fund. Authorizes the PCA to implement a reorganization plan to increase its personnel complement with a dedicated unit for planning, evaluation of proposals and monitoring of the proposals and projects funded by the Coconut Farmers and Industry Development Trust Fund.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PANGANIBAN, JOSE JR. T. CPA, LLB, MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, YAP, ARTHUR C., LAGMAN, EDCEL C., LOBREGAT, CELSO L., SAGARBARRIA, MANUEL, ESCUDERO, EVELINA G., TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D., CHAVEZ, CECILIA LEONILA V., SUAREZ, DANILO E.
